title: testing: examples do not always capture stdout
body:
Examples do not capture stdout when os.Stdout is assigned to a variable outside the example body:

```go
// foo_test.go
package foo

import "os"

var f = os.Stdout

func Example() {
	f.WriteString("a")
	// Output:
	// a
}
```

```
$ go test
a--- FAIL: Example (0.00s)
got:

want:
a
FAIL
exit status 1
```
